item.title: zFeeder 1.6 released
item.description:
zFeeder, the PHP RSS feedreader.
Added alternative login to admin panel with PHP sessions, WAP (wml) output support, fixed bugs when deleting feeds, content:encoded items support.
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zFeeder 1.5 released.
item.description: zFeeder, the PHP RSS newsreader (aggregator), version 1.5 fixes one small bug and has a new added field to template format. Some image files, corrupted in zFeeder 1.4, are now ok.
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zFeeder 1.4 released
item.description: zFeeder 1.4 has support for categories (multiple subscriptions files). The templates are now modified to reside in a single file and therefore are easier to modify. Included are some demo pages to get you going on how to use and customize it.
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zFeeder 1.3 released !
item.description: Includes support for online/offline refreshing (by popular request), multiple inclusions on the same page is allowed now, added a link to validate new added feeds at feedvalidator.org
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zvonNews renamed to zShaped, zvonFeeds renamed to zFeeder
item.description:
zvonNews has been renamed to zShaped
zvonFeeds has been renamed to zFeeder

zvonNews 1.1.1 -> zShaped 1.1
zvonNews 1.1.2 -> zShaped 1.2
zvonFeeds 1.0 -> zFeeder 1.0
zvonFeeds 1.1 -> zFeeder 1.1

Older downloads will be available until 15 Oct 2003
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zvonNews 1.1.2 launched
item.description:
zvonNews 1.1.2 has been launched today.
It has now Blogger API implemented to enable offline composing and posting of messages
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zvonNews 1.1.1 launched
item.description: zvonNews 1.1.1 has some weblog specific features as pinging weblogs, trackbacking and permalinks.
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zvonFeeds 1.1.0 launched
item.description:
zvonFeeds 1.1.0 it's an easier way to show on your site news from other sites. It has an administration panel where you can manage your subscriptions and aggregator configuration.
Among others has RSS autodiscovery, bookmarklet for your browser and importing and exporting subscriptions (OPML subscriptions files) from/to other aggregators, so that you can easily synchronize your site with your favourite desktop aggregator.
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.

item.title: zvonNews 1.1.0 launched
item.description: zvonnews 1.1.0 has a more functionally admin panel, generates RSS 2.0 feeds (backwards compatible with all previous versions) and is now template-driven.
item.dc:creator: Andrei B.
